name: Unwanted Experiment
storyline: A scientist has come to Hidden Town. It is rumored that he is conducting very strange experiments. Some of the villagers claim to have seen very unusual creatures near his laboratory. The scientist has kidnapped you and has trapped you in his laboratory. Try to escape before he comes back and you become a victim of his tests.
summary: Unwanted Experiment is the second chapter in the Hidden Town escape game series. You will have to interact between two characters who have to help each other to escape together from the mysterious laboratory in this great adventure full of adrenaline.
